data.name: Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys
data.detailed_description:
Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys, is a Fantasy RPG with a story-rich world, and more. Stop the evil cult, The Flaming Eye, from taming all of the elemental dragons so they can release Athys, the goddess of Choas, and destruction back into Crewin and delving the world into 10000 years of eternal darkness. Start as a simple man from the hold of Black Hollow and go on a journal for the ages.

Key Features:
-Souls-like combat system
Experience a Souls-like combat system complete with different types of weapons, directional rolling, parrys, special attacks, and more.

-Play Styles
There are different play styles for everyone. There are single-handed weapons, double-handed weapons, archery, and dual-wielding to fit anyone's play style.

-Story rich world
Experience the main story and many more from side quests and more important questlines that will progress you deeper into the world's lore.

- Mod Support (IN DEVELOPMENT)
I am hoping to be able to let the community express their creativeness with the ability to create mods for the game.

-Save system
Use bonfires to save your game and reset your stats.
data.about_the_game:

Key Features:

Experience a Souls-like combat system complete with different types of weapons, directional rolling, parrys, special attacks, and more.

data.short_description: Delve into an Open World RPG game and save the world. Use variations of close and ranged combat with special attacks, sneaking, and dodges to defeat your opponents during your quest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 120 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Latest
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 120 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
